Html:
Hi guys!

 

I wanted to know , if it is possible, how  can I use one of the layout algorithms in your project.

 

What I mean is: I don't need all the GUI part of Graph#, I just want to use one of the algorithms to help me layout items on a canvas.


But I have no idea where to start from... can anyone point me in the right direction?
Neverminde, I've (more or less) figured it out.
